dct_description_sm: Relief shown by contour lines and spot heights.; Colors show political divisions, in India only. Map also shows railroads, roads, canals, cities, towns, rivers, lakes, etc.; "Published under the direction of Colonel Sir S.G. Burrard ... Surveyor General of India."; Originally published in 1915. "Reprinted in 1928, with corrections to main roads and railways only."; "Reg. No. 980. D 07. S.I. 700 '28."
Ames Library of South Asia Maps
